feed.title: RSS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.4.4
entry.content:
• Bumped up JavaScript packages.
  • Updated build system to use NodeJS 20 instead of 18.
  • Updated GitHub docker image build system to latest working actions.

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.4.5
entry.content:
• Bumped up PHP package versions.
  • Updated cron/schedule system to use same user as app, to avoid file permission issues leading to app errors. #24

entry.title: New release for RSS: v1.5.0
entry.content:
• Updated framework from Laravel 10 to 11
  • Updated PHP version to PHP 8.3

entry.title: New release for RSS: v2.0.0 - Moved to Codeberg
entry.content:
This project, and the image being hosted, has now moved to Coderberg: https://codeberg.org/danb/rss Please update your environment to instead use the codeberg.org/danb/rss:latest image.

This was marked as a v2.0.0 to indicate it as a breaking change due to the added banner and migration to a new image host. If you instead want to keep using the existing GitHub hosted image, without the banner, you can pin the image version (ghcr.io/ssddanbrown/rss:v1.5.1) but you won't receive any further updates.

Changes

  • Added banner to advise about move to Codeberg.
